channel.title: Help?.. - Setting variables
channel.description:
[i]Well, I've never needed to do this for my old Computer but, how would I set Variables. I know there is a part telling how to do it in 'How to start a server' sticky, but it does not help me.[/i] [hr]
[i]This is my second topic but I will explain my problem more. [b]Well, to run my 508 client I need to set my variables I've been told, but I've never needed to do so on my old computer, but since I got a new computer it's all different.
If you find it hard explaining on forums add my MSN; r1d1n.dirty1@hotmail.com (Mostly on this one) Exalu_sniper@live.com.au (Rarely online, but I use it for E-mails alot)[/b][/i]

item.title: Help?.. - Setting variables
item.dc:creator: @phoenix123 phoenix123
item.description:
@phoenix123 wrote:

Make one call “classpath” and add the code: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Make another and call it “Path” and add the code: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;

And done…?

U must have jdk 6u12. if u have a different jdk, so name the “jdk1.6.0_12” to the name ur version is on: like jdk1.6.0_6 if u have the jdk6u6

hope u understand:P

Good luck

Read full topic
